//Coder: Stanly 

#include <algorithm>
#include <cmath>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <cstring>
#include <iostream>
#include <vector>

using namespace std;

typedef long long ll;
typedef unsigned long long ull;
#define pb          push_back
#define mp          make_pair
#define MOD         10000
int a[1001];
void calc(){
    int sum;
    a[0]=0;
    a[1]=1;
    a[2]=1;
    a[3]=2;
    a[4]=5;
    for(int i=5;i<=1000;i++){
        sum=0;
        for(int j=1;2*j<i;j++){
            sum=(sum+2*a[j]*a[i-j])%MOD;
        }
            if(i%2==0){
                sum+=a[i/2]*a[i/2];
                }
            a[i]=sum%MOD;
    }
    }
int main() {
    int t,n;
    calc();
    cin>>t;
    while(t--){
        cin>>n;
        cout<<a[n]<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
